message.code: CAN ONLY REFUND OR VOID APPROVED TRANSACTIONS

message.code: CANNOT VOID A CAPTURED AUTH (VOID THE CAPTURE INSTEAD).

message_list.message: Attempted to void a captured auth transaction. Please void the capture transaction instead.

message.code: CANNOT VOID EXCEPT FOR FULL AMOUNT.

message_list.message: Transaction can only be voided for their full amount.

message.code: REFUND/VOID AMOUNT CANNOT EXCEED ORIGINAL CHARGE AMOUNT

message_list.message: Attempted to refund or void more than the original transaction amount.

message.code: YOUR ACCOUNT IS IN TEST MODE; PLEASE CONTACT BLUEPAY.

message_list.message: Attempted to run a LIVE transaction on a TEST-only Iframe account. Please contact Amwal.
